5.effect: Increases the healing received of group members within 10 meters by 12%.

When you cast an ability that costs resources while in combat, you and up to 3 other group members within 8 meters gain a damage shield that absorbs 7000 damage for 6 seconds. This effect can occur once every 6 seconds.
Adds 385 Magicka Recovery and 385 Stamina Recovery.
When you taunt an enemy, you gain Major Heroism for 12 seconds, granting you 3 Ultimate every 1.5 seconds. This effect can occur once every 12 seconds.
Increases the damage of your Shock abilities by 10%.
Your Light and Heavy Attacks apply a stacking poison to the enemy that deals 960 Poison Damage every 1 second for 5 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.
Adds 330 Weapon and Spell Damage to your Dual Wield abilities.
Reduces the cost of your healing abilities by 8%.
When you deal damage with a fully-charged Heavy Attack, you inject venom into the target, dealing 12000 Poison Damage over 6 seconds. This effect can occur once every 6 seconds per target.
When you critically heal yourself or an ally, you grant them a damage shield that absorbs 5280 damage for 6 seconds. This effect can occur once every 6 seconds per target.
Dealing damage with a fully-charged Heavy Attack restores 1956 Magicka to you and all group members within 15 meters. This effect can occur once every 8 seconds.
Dealing damage with a Light Attack adds 480 Weapon and Spell Damage for 10 seconds.
When you deal damage, you gain Major Brutality and Sorcery for 10 seconds, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage by 20%. This effect can occur once every 10 seconds.
Adds 400 Weapon and Spell Damage while using a Destruction Staff ability.
When you deal melee damage, you inject the enemy with poisonous blood, dealing 4800 Poison Damage over 4 seconds. This effect can occur once every 4 seconds per target.

When you deal damage, you have a 15% chance to summon a shadowy clannfear to ambush the nearest enemy after 1 second, dealing 9000 Magic Damage to all enemies within 5 meters. This effect can occur once every 5 seconds.
When you heal yourself or an ally, grant them Minor Resolve for 8 seconds, increasing their Physical and Spell Resistance by 2974. This effect can occur once every 8 seconds per target.
Enemies within 5 meters of you have Minor Maim, reducing their damage done by 5%.
Increases the quality of items you find in treasure chests.
Reduces the cost of your Block by 8%.
Dealing damage grants you Crusader for 10 seconds, which reduces the Stamina, Magicka, and Health cost of your abilities by 8%.
When you take damage while you are under 35% Health, you gain a damage shield for 6 seconds that absorbs up to 9060 damage. This effect can occur once every 15 seconds.
When you deal direct damage, you have a 20% chance to deal 3550 Shock Damage to enemies within 8 meters of you. This effect can occur once every 4 seconds.
When you dodge roll, you gain Major Expedition for 8 seconds, increasing your Movement Speed by 30%.
When you take damage while you have a damage shield active, gain Major Heroism for 9 seconds, granting you 3 Ultimate every 1.5 seconds. This effect can occur once every 9 seconds.
Killing an enemy within 2 meters of you restores 4500 Health. This effect can occur once every 1 second.
Adds 340 Weapon and Spell Damage when you have a Two Handed weapon equipped or are Dual Wielding.
Adds 1314 Critical Chance.
Increases your Max Health by 1000 for you and up to 11 group members within 28 meters of you.

3.effect: Gain Minor Slayer at all times, increasing damage to Dungeon, Trial, and Arena Monsters by 5%

5.effect: Reduces the cost of Magicka abilities by 4% for you and up to 11 group members within 28 meters of you.
When you deal Flame Damage, you apply Burning to your target and gain 525 Weapon and Spell Damage for 8 seconds. This effect can occur once every 8 seconds.
Dealing Flame Damage applies Minor Breach and Minor Fracture to enemies for 10 seconds, reducing their Physical and Spell Resistance by 2974. This effect can occur once every 5 seconds.
When you take melee damage, you have a 50% chance to deal 1025 Flame Damage to all enemies within 5 meters. This effect can occur once every 1 second.

When you deal damage with a Light Attack, you create an Aura of Pride at your target's location for 10 seconds, which heals you for 1650 Health every 1 second and restores 375 Stamina if you are standing within 5 meters of the aura. This effect can occur once every 15 seconds.
When you heal a target that is at full Health, grant them Major Courage for 10 seconds, increasing their Weapon and Spell Damage by 430. This effect can occur once every 5 seconds per target.
Increases your Health, Magicka, and Stamina Recovery by 200.

When you take damage, you create a pool of desecrated blood beneath you, dealing 350 Magic Damage every 1 second for 6 seconds to all enemies in the area and healing you for 100% of the damage done. This effect can occur once every 6 seconds.
When you deal Critical Damage with a direct damage attack, you gain 516 Weapon and Spell Damage for 5 seconds. This effect can occur once every 5 seconds.
Your direct damage attacks ignore Damage Shields. Your damage done against Damage Shields is increased by 300%.
When you deal damage from an enemy's flank, you deal an additional 2830 Physical Damage. This effect can occur once every 1 second.
When you deal direct damage, gain Major Sorcery for 12 seconds, increasing your Spell Damage by 20%. This effect can occur once every 12 seconds.

When you complete a fully-charged Heavy Attack, you spawn a web at the enemy's location for 10 seconds. Enemies in the web take 350 Magic Damage every 1 second and are snared by 50%. This effect can occur once every 10 seconds.
Adds 520 Magicka Recovery.

When you damage an enemy that has more than 90% Health, you apply Hunter's Mark for 30 seconds. Your direct damage against enemies with Hunter's Mark has a 10% chance to deal an additional 9675 Physical Damage and stun them for 3 seconds. Once applied, you cannot apply Hunter's Mark to the same target for 60 seconds.

When you take damage while under 30% Health, you heal for 20% of your Max Health, gain Major Vitality for 10 seconds, and remove 1 negative effect from yourself. This effect can occur once every 45 seconds.
Increases your Bleed Damage done by 20%.

When you heal yourself or an ally, you create a circle of nature beneath them for 5 seconds. Allies in the circle recover 400 Magicka and Stamina every 1 second. This effect can occur once every 5 seconds.

When you deal direct damage, you have a 10% chance to summon a line of fire that moves forward after 1 second, dealing 11000 Flame Damage to all enemies in its path. This effect can occur once every 2 seconds.
